abstract: ABC ignited a bit of a firestorm Tuesday night by filling a section of the bottom right corner of the television screen during “Lost” with a blood-red V and a countdown clock to promote the return of the series “V.”

lead_paragraph: Does ABC really understand how rabidly fans of “Lost” watch their favorite show, parsing out every bit of information on the screen?

headline.main: Update: That ‘V’ Made ‘Lost’ Hard to See
